RelatedSentence: Dubai : Readers were optimistic about the launch of the Al Etihad Credit Bureau in the UAE , as it meant better service and a way to end falling into debt .
Another reader , Vidya R. , a Dubai - based homemaker , felt that for some , this move may have a negative impact .
